postData.title: Certifying Complexity Analysis
postData.author: Neea Rusch
postData.preface: I presented this talk at CoqPL'23 in Boston, on January 21, 2023.
postData.abstract: This work drafts a strategy that leverages the field of Implicit Computational Complexity to certify resource usage in imperative programs. This original approach sidesteps some of the most commonâ€“and difficultâ€“obstacles â€œtraditionalâ€ complexity theory face when implemented in Coq.
postData.abs_plain: This work drafts a strategy that leverages the field of Implicit Computational Complexity to certify resource usage in imperative programs. This original approach sidesteps some of the most commonâ€“and difficultâ€“obstacles â€œtraditionalâ€ complexity theory face when implemented in Coq.
